verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> there were two <S%H8147><s%> women, <S%H802><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> mother: <S%H517><s%>

And they committed <S%H2181><s%> prostitutions in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> they committed <S%H2181><s%> prostitutions in their youth: <S%H5271><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> were their breasts <S%H7699><s%> pressed, <S%H4600><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they bruised <S%H6213><s%> the teats <S%H1717><s%> of their virginity. <S%H1331><s%>

And the names <S%H8034><s%> of them were Aholah <S%H170><s%> the elder, <S%H1419><s%> and Aholibah <S%H172><s%> her sister: <S%H269><s%> and they were mine, and they bore <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%> Thus were their names; <S%H8034><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> is Aholah, <S%H170><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Aholibah. <S%H172><s%>

And Aholah <S%H170><s%> played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> when she was mine; and she doted <S%H5689><s%> on <S%H413><s%> her lovers, <S%H157><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the Assyrians <S%H804><s%> her neighbors, <S%H7138><s%>

Which were clothed <S%H3847><s%> with blue, <S%H8504><s%> captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers, <S%H5461><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men, horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses. <S%H5483><s%>

Thus she committed <S%H5414><s%> her prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> with them, with all them that were the chosen <S%H4005><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> on whom <S%H834><s%> she doted: <S%H5689><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> she defiled <S%H2930><s%> herself.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> she her prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> brought from Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> for in her youth <S%H5271><s%> they lay <S%H7901><s%> with her, and they bruised <S%H6213><s%> the breasts <S%H1717><s%> of her virginity, <S%H1331><s%> and poured <S%H8210><s%> their prostitution <S%H8457><s%> on her.

Why <S%H3651><s%> I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> her into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her lovers, <S%H157><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> on whom <S%H834><s%> she doted. <S%H5689><s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> they took <S%H3947><s%> her sons <S%H1121><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and slew her with the sword: <S%H2719><s%> and she became <S%H1961><s%> famous <S%H8034><s%> among women; <S%H802><s%> for they had executed <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H8196><s%> on her.

And when her sister <S%H269><s%> Aholibah <S%H172><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> this, she was more corrupt <S%H7843><s%> in her inordinate <S%H5691><s%> love <S%H5691><s%> than she, and in her prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> more than her sister <S%H269><s%> in her prostitutions. <S%H8457><s%>

She doted <S%H5689><s%> on the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> her neighbors, <S%H7138><s%> captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers <S%H5461><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> most gorgeously, <S%H4358><s%> horsemen <S%H6571><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men.
Then I saw <S%H7200><s%> that she was defiled, <S%H2930><s%> that they took both <S%H8147><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%>

And that she increased <S%H3254><s%> her prostitutions: <S%H8457><s%> for when she saw <S%H7200><s%> men <S%H582><s%> portrayed <S%H2707><s%> on the wall, <S%H7023><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3779><s%> portrayed <S%H2710><s%> with vermilion, <S%H8350><s%>

Girded <S%H2289><s%> with girdles <S%H232><s%> on their loins, <S%H4975><s%> exceeding <S%H5628><s%> in dyed <S%H2871><s%> attire <S%H2871><s%> on their heads, <S%H7218><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them princes <S%H7991><s%> to look <S%H4758><s%> to, after the manner <S%H1823><s%> of the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> of Chaldea, <S%H3778><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of their nativity: <S%H4138><s%>
And as soon <S%H4758><s%> as she saw them with her eyes, <S%H5869><s%> she doted <S%H5689><s%> on them, and sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to them into Chaldea. <S%H3778><s%>

And the Babylonians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to her into the bed <S%H4904><s%> of love, <S%H1730><s%> and they defiled <S%H2930><s%> her with their prostitution, <S%H8457><s%> and she was polluted <S%H2930><s%> with them, and her mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H3363><s%> from them.

So she discovered <S%H1540><s%> her prostitutions, <S%H8457><s%> and discovered <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> then my mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H3363><s%> from her, like as my mind <S%H5315><s%> was alienated <S%H5361><s%> from her sister. <S%H269><s%>

Yet she multiplied <S%H7235><s%> her prostitutions, <S%H8457><s%> in calling <S%H2142><s%> to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of her youth, <S%H5271><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> she had played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For she doted <S%H5689><s%> on their paramours, <S%H6370><s%> whose flesh <S%H1320><s%> is as the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of asses, <S%H2543><s%> and whose issue <S%H2231><s%> is like the issue <S%H2231><s%> of horses. <S%H5483><s%>

Thus you called <S%H6485><s%> to remembrance <S%H6485><s%> the lewdness <S%H2154><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> in bruising <S%H6213><s%> your teats <S%H1717><s%> by the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> for the breasts <S%H7699><s%> of your youth. <S%H5271><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O Aholibah, <S%H172><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will raise <S%H5782><s%> up your lovers <S%H157><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, from whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> your mind <S%H5315><s%> is alienated, <S%H5361><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them against <S%H5921><s%> you on every <S%H5437><s%> side; <S%H5439><s%>

The Babylonians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H894><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Chaldeans, <S%H3779><s%> Pekod, <S%H6489><s%> and Shoa, <S%H7772><s%> and Koa, <S%H6970><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Assyrians <S%H804><s%> with them: all <S%H3605><s%> of them desirable <S%H2531><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men, captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers, <S%H5461><s%> great <S%H7991><s%> lords <S%H7991><s%> and renowned, <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses. <S%H5483><s%>

And they shall come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you with chariots, <S%H2021><s%> wagons, <S%H7393><s%> and wheels, <S%H1534><s%> and with an assembly <S%H6951><s%> of people, <S%H5971><s%> which shall set <S%H7760><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you buckler <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet <S%H6959><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about: and I will set <S%H5414><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> you according to their judgments. <S%H4941><s%>

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> against you, and they shall deal <S%H6213><s%> furiously <S%H2534><s%> with you: they shall take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> your nose <S%H639><s%> and your ears; <S%H241><s%> and your remnant <S%H319><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> they shall take <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and your residue <S%H319><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> by the fire. <S%H784><s%>
They shall also strip <S%H6584><s%> you out of your clothes, <S%H899><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> away your fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels. <S%H3627><s%>

Thus will I make your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from you, and your prostitution <S%H2184><s%> brought from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> so that you shall not lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> to them, nor <S%H3808><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> you into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them whom <S%H834><s%> you hate, <S%H8130><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them from whom <S%H834><s%> your mind <S%H5315><s%> is alienated: <S%H5361><s%>

And they shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with you hatefully, <S%H8135><s%> and shall take <S%H3947><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> your labor, <S%H3018><s%> and shall leave <S%H5800><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore: <S%H6181><s%> and the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your prostitutions <S%H2183><s%> shall be discovered, <S%H1540><s%> both your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your prostitutions. <S%H8457><s%>

I will do <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things to you, because you have gone a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> you are polluted <S%H2930><s%> with their idols. <S%H1544><s%>
You have walked <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of your sister; <S%H269><s%> therefore will I give <S%H5414><s%> her cup <S%H3563><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> You shall drink <S%H8354><s%> of your sister's <S%H269><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> deep <S%H6013><s%> and large: <S%H7342><s%> you shall be laughed <S%H6712><s%> to scorn and had in derision; <S%H3932><s%> it contains <S%H3557><s%> much. <S%H4767><s%>

You shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with drunkenness <S%H7943><s%> and sorrow, <S%H3015><s%> with the cup <S%H3563><s%> of astonishment <S%H8047><s%> and desolation, <S%H8077><s%> with the cup <S%H3563><s%> of your sister <S%H269><s%> Samaria. <S%H8111><s%>

You shall even drink <S%H8354><s%> it and suck <S%H4680><s%> it out, and you shall break <S%H1633><s%> the shards <S%H2789><s%> thereof, and pluck <S%H5423><s%> off your own breasts: <S%H7699><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me, and cast <S%H7993><s%> me behind <S%H310><s%> your back, <S%H1458><s%> therefore bear <S%H5375><s%> you also <S%H1571><s%> your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and your prostitutions. <S%H8457><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover to me; Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> will you judge <S%H8199><s%> Aholah <S%H170><s%> and Aholibah? <S%H172><s%> yes, declare <S%H5046><s%> to them their abominations; <S%H8441><s%>

That they have committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> is in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and with their idols <S%H1544><s%> have they committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and have also <S%H1571><s%> caused their sons, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they bore <S%H3205><s%> to me, to pass <S%H5674><s%> for them through the fire, to devour <S%H402><s%> them.

Moreover <S%H5750><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> to me: they have defiled <S%H2930><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

For when they had slain <S%H7819><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%> to their idols, <S%H1544><s%> then they came <S%H935><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to profane <S%H2490><s%> it; and, see, <S%H2009><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> have they done <S%H6213><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my house. <S%H1004><s%>

And furthermore, <S%H637><s%> that you have sent <S%H7971><s%> for men <S%H582><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> from far, <S%H4801><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H413><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> was sent; <S%H7971><s%> and, see, <S%H2009><s%> they came: <S%H935><s%> for whom <S%H834><s%> you did wash <S%H7364><s%> yourself, painted <S%H3583><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and decked <S%H5710><s%> yourself with ornaments, <S%H5716><s%>

And sat <S%H3427><s%> on a stately <S%H3520><s%> bed, <S%H4296><s%> and a table <S%H7979><s%> prepared <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it, whereupon <S%H5921><s%> you have set <S%H7760><s%> my incense <S%H7004><s%> and my oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And a voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude <S%H1995><s%> being at ease <S%H7961><s%> was with her: and with the men <S%H582><s%> of the common <S%H7230><s%> sort <S%H120><s%> were brought <S%H935><s%> Sabeans <S%H5433><s%> from the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> which put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crowns <S%H5850><s%> on their heads. <S%H7218><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> I to her that was old <S%H1087><s%> in adulteries, <S%H5004><s%> Will they now <S%H6258><s%> commit <S%H2181><s%> prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> with her, and she with them?

Yet they went <S%H935><s%> in to her, as they go <S%H935><s%> in to a woman <S%H802><s%> that plays the harlot: <S%H2181><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> went <S%H935><s%> they in to Aholah <S%H170><s%> and to Aholibah, <S%H172><s%> the lewd <S%H2154><s%> women. <S%H802><s%>

And the righteous <S%H6662><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> them after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of adulteresses, <S%H5003><s%> and after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of women that shed <S%H8210><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are adulteresses, <S%H5003><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> is in their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will bring <S%H5927><s%> up a company <S%H6951><s%> on them, and will give <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> and spoiled. <S%H957><s%>

And the company <S%H6951><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones, <S%H68><s%> and dispatch <S%H1254><s%> them with their swords; <S%H2719><s%> they shall slay <S%H4191><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> up their houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Thus will I cause lewdness <S%H2154><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of the land, <S%H776><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> women <S%H802><s%> may be taught <S%H3256><s%> not to do <S%H6213><s%> after your lewdness. <S%H2154><s%>

And they shall recompense <S%H5414><s%> your lewdness <S%H2154><s%> on you, and you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the sins <S%H2399><s%> of your idols: <S%H1544><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
